text: @betterbradford @WYFRS @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @Bradford_TandA @yorkshirepost Why is nobody picking up on the complete failure to enforce an identified serious fire risk before that risk manifested itself?
@betterbradford @WYFRS @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @Bradford_TandA @yorkshirepost https://t.co/sPa9Mg5n4m
@betterbradford @WYFRS @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @Bradford_TandA @yorkshirepost https://t.co/cn8Q3eJju6
@WatersideCare @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands @KeepBritainTidy üò∞
@betterbradford @WYFRS @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @Bradford_TandA @yorkshirepost https://t.co/79exmruL47
@betterbradford @WYFRS @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @Bradford_TandA @yorkshirepost https://t.co/uUaQDi7Ens

@betterbradford This question just isn't being asked. Yes of course the firefighters have done an amazing job. But surely there were enforcement actions that could have been taken by @WYFRS, @bradfordmdc and/or @EnvAgency in July. Neither @Bradford_TandA nor @yorkshirepost reported this angle.
